title: [LOVE] Ep. 72: How to Keep the Spark Alive in your Relationship w/ Vanessa Marin
description:
Does your sex life leave you feeling unsatisfied?

Join Ash this week while she interviews Vanessa Marin a licensed sex therapist who helps individuals and couples learn to value their own pleasure.  Listen in to learn how to keep the spark alive in your relationships.

Sex is challenging for everyone, especially when you are used to living in your masculine energy.  If you struggle with reaching orgasm, Vanessa shares tips on how to remove the shame you feel centered in this and tips to reach that big-o.  

Chemistry is something that we create and is something that must be nourished over time.  Learn what side of the spectrum your relationship lies on and where you can make changes to get it where you want. 

Vanessa shares one key characteristic in a partner to look for in order to have a healthy sex life with your partner.  Never underestimate the power of sex, masturbation, and organism.  There are a handful of benefits and Vanessa and Ash break them all down.  Don't forget to stick around for Ash’s post-episode notes, juicy as ever!

 

In This Episode, You Will Learn:

  1. How to balance masculine and feminine energy in and out of the bedroom.
  2. How to remove the shame from not orgasming or having performance anxiety.
  3. Blockages holding you back from keeping the spark alive in your sex life.
  4. Steps to get in touch with your sex life.

 

Where You Can Find Vanessa:

www.vmtherapy.com

vmtherapy.com/best-way-to-orgasm.com

Instagram: @vanessamarin

 

Promotions:

Ready to land the job you love? Visit YouTurnPodcast.com/joboffer
